resources.string: In the popular Harry Potter series, what is Hermione Granger\'s middle name?
Who is the author of the famous classic, \'A picture of Dorian Gray\'?
Who was the first Non-European to win the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1913?
JK Rowling wrote \'A Cuckoo\'s Calling\' under what pen name?
\'The Raven\' is known to be the most famous work of the unconventional poet X. Which one of the following is another work of his?
\'And miles to go before I sleep\' is a quote from which one these poets' masterpiece?
\'7 Khoon Maaf\' is a Bolllywood adaptation of a novel written by whom?
Satyajit Ray\'s crime thriller series stars an amateur sleuth fondly called Feluda. What is Feluda's real name?
The novel \'Fahrenheit 451\' depicts a society where which of the following is banned?
Who gives the famous speech on the \'Quality of Mercy\' in William Shakespeare\'s \'The Merchant of Venice\'?
